26367 29439 People once believed
that when someone dies...

29527 33645 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

33727 36958 But sometimes,
something so bad happens...

37047 42075 that a terrible sadness is carried
with it and the soul can't rest.

42167 45079 Then, sometimes--
just sometimes--

45167 49957 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.

102327 106639 Shelly Webster and Eric Draven.
Wedding was tomorrow night.
